data.description:
üååExperience the profound depths of the Amazon and its age-old traditions with "AYAHUASCA Kosmik Journey," an unparalleled VR film that offers a transcendental dive into the powerful visions induced by ayahuasca, a potent indigenous brew. 

üåÄEvery individual's journey is unique, as diverse angles and perspectives uncover fresh insights and interpretations. Unveil a cosmic voyage that resonates deep within. 

KEY FEATURES:

üëÅÔ∏èA Personal Journey: Experience the Amazon through the eyes of the esteemed director Jan Kounen. With over two decades dedicated to exploring the Amazon's heart and its sacred rituals, Kounen's perspective offers a deeply immersive and authentic narrative.

üçÉSacred Rituals & Traditions: The film stays true to the Shipibo tradition of consuming ayahuasca. Rather than just a hallucinogenic trip, it's a meditative and transformative ritual. Guiding your journey is an indigenous South American shaman, ensuring the experience remains grounded in age-old wisdom and authenticity.

Dive into your subconscious, embrace the serenity within, and embark on an unforgettable kosmik odyssey. Join us in this ethereal exploration and discover the infinite landscapes of the mind.

AWARDS

üèÜ Best Documentary - Raindance 2019
üîñ Nominee - Tribeca 2019
data.developer: a_BAHN, Atlas V, Small Studio by Mac Guff
